pullrequest.title: Return failure to system if exit abnormally. Issue #1178. (-> 2.2)

content.raw: Only nit-pick: I'd probably follow the same pattern ad you did in gazebo_main.cc and set a variable, `return_value` so that there's only a single exit point for the whole function. But the function is so simple it really doesn't matter.
content.html: Only nit-pick: I'd probably follow the same pattern ad you did in gazebo_main.cc and set a variable, return_value so that there's only a single exit point for the whole function. But the function is so simple it really doesn't matter.
